snippet: The return of Kozmo.com, albeit in a new incarnation, brings back memories of that wild and crazy Internet boom.
abstract: John Schwartz Essay humorously notes return of messenger service Kozmo.com, albeit in new incarnation, that brings back memories of the dot.com bubble of the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: The return of Kozmo.com, albeit in a new incarnation, brings back memories of that wild and crazy Internet boom.

headline.main: Craving Those Good Old Dot-Com Days
headline.print_headline: Why I Crave Those Dot-Com Days
